law.catch_line: This Part IV of this subtitle:...
law.text:
This Part IV of this subtitle:
may not be construed to restrict or alter the authority of any public or private agency or institution that deals with out-of-home placement, adoption, or related matters; and
is related to and should be read in relation to Subtitle 13 of this title and §§ 5-524, 5-525, 5-525.1, and 5-534 of this subtitle.
